resources.string:
To record a session:
 	 	 1. Make sure your device is ON and paired with your phone (go to bluetooth settings to pair the device if not)
 	 	 2. Open the top right corner menu
 	 	3. Select "Start Recording"


To stop the music / end the session, select "Stop Recording" from the same menu.


To record a session without playing Biomusic, uncheck the "Play Biomusic" switch on the home page before clicking "Start Recording".


Make sure your finger is correctly placed on the TPS as follows:
